sentences.en: She inveigles Paco into a plot to swindle Tania out of her savings.
sentences.cn: 她把帕科诱骗进了一个骗取塔尼娅积蓄的阴谋里。

sentences.en: With patience and diplomacy, she can eventually inveigle him into marrying her.
sentences.cn: 她靠耐心和交际手腕, 到头来是能引诱他与她结婚的.

trans.tran_en: If you inveigle someone into doing something, you cleverly persuade them to do it when they do not really want to
